title: Leviathan.007
author: Leviathan.007
content: Description:This scam project is offering investment plans from 15 percent after 24 hours to 100 percent after 5 days and just like the other Ponzi projects they give 10 percent referral commissions to the people who get invite other friends into this trap.Reference Link:https://bipartnersltd.com/WhoIs info:https://whois.domaintools.com/Finrafoundationinvest.comCreated on 2022-12-13Expires on 2023-12-13Updated on 2022-12-13Payment Method:Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc...Archive:https://archive.vn/0dzSGAdditional Notes:In order to take down this project please report the website to their registrar (In this case NameCheap). Here is a little guide about how to report the scammers to their registrar: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5281378

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Leviathan.007 on January 06, 2023, 06:44:49 PMThis scam project is offering investment plans from 15 percent after 24 hours to 100 percent after 5 days ...If that interest rate is compounding, I bet we can all become billionaires within 6 months!Â  Don't be a sucker and fall for scams and ponzi schemes promising instant wealth in return for your money. The scammer is just looking to make money off naive investors who think they're getting rich quick.
